name: Recollection (ECGJ #4)
description:
Be in an old man's shoe as he tries to recollect memories of his wife.

Made for the ExtraCredits game jam. While not the full game the team envisioned, we still were satisfied with the process.

Move the mouse to select buttons in the first menu, then move with the arrow keys and mouse.

Sorry this is not open source, I have not been given that build yet.

Development: mdelally, Revian

Music: KeithAmHere

Art design: mdellaly, SirRaynor, bowmanruto
